text: [Music]
how did service now get into the
security business well that's an
interesting story we um we have this
great platform and the service now
platform and my team was struggling with
incident response as any organization
and trying to look out there for any
tool that could possibly help us manage
the process of the incident response
itself
and we came to realize there's nothing
out there we basically took our great
platform and we decided to drink our own
champagne or eat our own do dog food if
you may and we customized the
application to be specific for security
and that's what we've been using for a
while until someone kind of said hey
this this could become a product we
could sell this we can make money out of
this so that's how it got incubated in
my team actually and we launched it in
the market like a year and a half ago
mhm and we are actually continuing to
use that you know now productized
version and we are the first to tested
before our customers actually see the
first launch of it every new release
[Music]
